description: CMD-OS 1.1.1 (CMD for OpenStack) is a revision of the Cloud Middleware Distribution, targeted for use with OpenStack Mitaka. It contains a fix for the cmd-release package.
releaseNotes: This release contains the following:<br>* Ubuntu Xenial<br>cmd-release 1.0.1
installationNotes: All products in CMD-OS 1.1.1 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
changeLog: This release includes cmd-release for Ubuntu Xenial.

products.name: umd.cmd-release
products.description: Cloud Middleware repository configuration for all OpenStack products
